location.description: The Geo-location where the resource lives

properties.description: Properties required to the Create Or Update Alias(Disaster Recovery configurations)

name.description: The configuration name. Should always be "$default".

properties.description: Properties required to the Create Migration Configuration

Action.description: Represents the filter actions which are allowed for the transformation of a message that have been matched by a filter expression.

compatibilityLevel.description: This property is reserved for future use. An integer value showing the compatibility level, currently hard-coded to 20.

requiresPreprocessing.description: Value that indicates whether the rule action requires preprocessing.

ArmDisasterRecoveryProperties.description: Properties required to the Create Or Update Alias(Disaster Recovery configurations)

alternateName.description: Primary/Secondary eventhub namespace name, which is part of GEO DR pairing

partnerNamespace.description: ARM Id of the Primary/Secondary eventhub namespace name, which is part of GEO DR pairing

replyTo.description: Address of the queue to reply to.

requiresPreprocessing.description: Value that indicates whether the rule action requires preprocessing.

MigrationConfigPropertiesProperties.description: Properties required to the Create Migration Configuration

postMigrationName.description: Name to access Standard Namespace after migration

targetNamespace.description: Existing premium Namespace ARM Id name which has no entities, will be used for migration

ignoreMissingVnetServiceEndpoint.description: Value that indicates whether to ignore missing VNet Service Endpoint

defaultAction.description: Default Action for Network Rule Set

action.description: Represents the filter actions which are allowed for the transformation of a message that have been matched by a filter expression.

filterType.description: Filter type that is evaluated against a BrokeredMessage.

rights.description: The rights associated with the rule.

autoDeleteOnIdle.description: ISO 8061 timeSpan idle interval after which the queue is automatically deleted. The minimum duration is 5 minutes.

deadLetteringOnMessageExpiration.description: A value that indicates whether this queue has dead letter support when a message expires.

defaultMessageTimeToLive.description: ISO 8601 default message timespan to live value. This is the duration after which the message expires, starting from when the message is sent to Service Bus. This is the default value used when TimeToLive is not set on a message itself.

duplicateDetectionHistoryTimeWindow.description: ISO 8601 timeSpan structure that defines the duration of the duplicate detection history. The default value is 10 minutes.

enableBatchedOperations.description: Value that indicates whether server-side batched operations are enabled.

enableExpress.description: A value that indicates whether Express Entities are enabled. An express queue holds a message in memory temporarily before writing it to persistent storage.

enablePartitioning.description: A value that indicates whether the queue is to be partitioned across multiple message brokers.

forwardDeadLetteredMessagesTo.description: Queue/Topic name to forward the Dead Letter message

forwardTo.description: Queue/Topic name to forward the messages

lockDuration.description: ISO 8601 timespan duration of a peek-lock; that is, the amount of time that the message is locked for other receivers. The maximum value for LockDuration is 5 minutes; the default value is 1 minute.

maxDeliveryCount.description: The maximum delivery count. A message is automatically deadlettered after this number of deliveries. default value is 10.

maxSizeInMegabytes.description: The maximum size of the queue in megabytes, which is the size of memory allocated for the queue. Default is 1024.

requiresDuplicateDetection.description: A value indicating if this queue requires duplicate detection.

requiresSession.description: A value that indicates whether the queue supports the concept of sessions.

status.description: Enumerates the possible values for the status of a messaging entity.

capacity.description: The specified messaging units for the tier. For Premium tier, capacity are 1,2 and 4.

tier.description: The billing tier of this particular SKU.

autoDeleteOnIdle.description: ISO 8061 timeSpan idle interval after which the topic is automatically deleted. The minimum duration is 5 minutes.

deadLetteringOnFilterEvaluationException.description: Value that indicates whether a subscription has dead letter support on filter evaluation exceptions.

deadLetteringOnMessageExpiration.description: Value that indicates whether a subscription has dead letter support when a message expires.

defaultMessageTimeToLive.description: ISO 8061 Default message timespan to live value. This is the duration after which the message expires, starting from when the message is sent to Service Bus. This is the default value used when TimeToLive is not set on a message itself.

duplicateDetectionHistoryTimeWindow.description: ISO 8601 timeSpan structure that defines the duration of the duplicate detection history. The default value is 10 minutes.

enableBatchedOperations.description: Value that indicates whether server-side batched operations are enabled.

forwardDeadLetteredMessagesTo.description: Queue/Topic name to forward the Dead Letter message

forwardTo.description: Queue/Topic name to forward the messages

lockDuration.description: ISO 8061 lock duration timespan for the subscription. The default value is 1 minute.

requiresSession.description: Value indicating if a subscription supports the concept of sessions.

status.description: Enumerates the possible values for the status of a messaging entity.

autoDeleteOnIdle.description: ISO 8601 timespan idle interval after which the topic is automatically deleted. The minimum duration is 5 minutes.

defaultMessageTimeToLive.description: ISO 8601 Default message timespan to live value. This is the duration after which the message expires, starting from when the message is sent to Service Bus. This is the default value used when TimeToLive is not set on a message itself.

duplicateDetectionHistoryTimeWindow.description: ISO8601 timespan structure that defines the duration of the duplicate detection history. The default value is 10 minutes.

enableBatchedOperations.description: Value that indicates whether server-side batched operations are enabled.

enableExpress.description: Value that indicates whether Express Entities are enabled. An express topic holds a message in memory temporarily before writing it to persistent storage.

enablePartitioning.description: Value that indicates whether the topic to be partitioned across multiple message brokers is enabled.

maxSizeInMegabytes.description: Maximum size of the topic in megabytes, which is the size of the memory allocated for the topic. Default is 1024.

requiresDuplicateDetection.description: Value indicating if this topic requires duplicate detection.

status.description: Enumerates the possible values for the status of a messaging entity.

supportOrdering.description: Value that indicates whether the topic supports ordering.

SqlFilter.description: Represents a filter which is a composition of an expression and an action that is executed in the pub/sub pipeline.

compatibilityLevel.description: This property is reserved for future use. An integer value showing the compatibility level, currently hard-coded to 20.

requiresPreprocessing.description: Value that indicates whether the rule action requires preprocessing.

id.description: Resource ID of Virtual Network Subnet

properties.description: Properties required to the Create Or Update Alias(Disaster Recovery configurations)

name.description: The configuration name. Should always be "$default".

properties.description: Properties required to the Create Migration Configuration
